eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 07:50 AM ON NOV 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:50 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Phoenix, Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Phoenix Police is looking for 61-year-old Native American female Raquel Zamorano. She is 4 feet 11 inches tall and weighing 135 pounds with brown/gray hair and brown eyes. She was last seen on Monday, November 24, 2025, around 1:00 PM on foot in the area of North 16th Street and East Osborn Road in Phoenix. Raquel was wearing a brown jacket, pink shirt, black pants and unknown color/style shoes. Raquel suffers from a medical condition which may cause her to become confused and easily lost. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
